description: nude bathers in a river; trees; nude woman with her hair in a bun, waving, seen from back, seated on river bank in foreground, right of center; inscription in LRC; printed in sepia
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Sign LRC, in the print: [A MES AMIS / en Souvenir DU /
title: Menu:  A Mes Amis, 8 Mai 1912
